About Whether Weather

Whether Weather is a client-side, privacy-focused weather dashboard. No accounts or back-ends—just static HTML, CSS, and JavaScript running entirely in your browser.

Features

  • Dashboard: At-a-glance min/max + icon for six cities.
  • City Focus: Hourly & 7-day forecasts with interactive cards.
  • Favorites & Home City: Highlight your top picks and jump straight to them.
  • Units & Dark Mode: Switch °C/°F, light/dark themes, and auto-refresh.

Data & Icons

All weather data from the Open-Meteo API, icons from OpenWeatherMap.

FAQ

Why no signup? Preferences live in your browser’s localStorage, so there’s no server or account to maintain.

How often does data refresh? Based on your auto-refresh setting (5/15/30 min) or manually by reloading the page.

Credits

  • Built with Eleventy (static site generator).
  • Styled with Bulma CSS and plain HTML & JavaScript.
  • Deployed on Netlify.
  • Icons by OpenWeatherMap; data by Open-Meteo.
